item.title: Migrating BitLocker Recovery Key Management from ConfigMgr to Intune: A Practical Guide
item.description:
Hi, I'm Herbert Fuchs, a Cloud Solution Architect. In this blog, I’ll guide you through migrating existing BitLocker recovery keys from Configuration Manager to Intune—especially for scenarios involving already encrypted devices. While many posts cover Intune setup basics for greenfield deployments, this guide dives deeper into real-world considerations for Hybrid-Joined, co-managed environments.
